008b650f-3370-4459-a2fc-3056110c38cc.description: Earners of the Nokia Network Routing Specialist I (NRS I) Certification are familiar with the basics of the TCP/IP layered model, Ethernet, Internet addressing and packet forwarding, routing protocols, MPLS tunneling, and Virtual Private Network (VPN) services.
008b650f-3370-4459-a2fc-3056110c38cc.name: Nokia Network Routing Specialist I (NRS I) Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-100 Nokia IP Networks and Services Fundamentals Exam.

e1368bd7-2ad0-4790-b00e-9c20bd328c54.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-100 exam can describe TCP/IP layered model basics, ethernet protocol, internet protocol addressing and packet forwarding, routing protocols, and MPLS tunneling; VPN services. They can identify service components and configuration steps on the Nokia 7750 SR, common routing protocols, and OSPF/BGP. Successful candidates can perform basic configuration with Nokia 7750 Service Router (SR) command-line interface.
e1368bd7-2ad0-4790-b00e-9c20bd328c54.name: Nokia IP Networks and Services Fundamentals Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-100 Nokia IP Networks and Services Fundamentals Exam.

4f345863-1ea3-49c9-bbd5-3bca2d30bb3d.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-104 exam can describe VPWS, VPLS, SAP encapsulation types and behavior, SDP, VPRN, and MTU size implications. They can differentiate between SAP and network ports, transport tunnels and service tunnels, mesh and spoke SDPs, and local and distributed mirror services. Successful candidates can configure an Epipe, VPLS service, and IES. They can configure/verify remote mirror service and IPv4/IPv6 VPRN service operations, and analyse configured system with OAM tools.
4f345863-1ea3-49c9-bbd5-3bca2d30bb3d.name: Nokia Services Architecture Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-104 Nokia Services Architecture Exam.

0cd7debb-0e5f-4eeb-b1ed-131e7502b9a5.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-103 can understand MPLS technology, MPLS shortcuts, label distribution protocol, LDP label distribution for FECs, establishing LDP/RSVP-TE LSP, traffic engineering, and SRLG. They can identify traffic engineering extensions and LSP protection mechanisms. Successful candidates can configure MPLS-based core network with LDP/RSVP-TE, 6PE on 7750 SR network, and RSVP-TE LSPs, and can troubleshoot LDP/RVSP-TE-established LSPs on the Nokia 7750 SR/Nokia 7450 ESS.
0cd7debb-0e5f-4eeb-b1ed-131e7502b9a5.name: Nokia Multiprotocol Label Switching Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-103 Nokia Multiprotocol Label Switching Exam

b46975cb-f047-49bc-b0dc-a9480f5917a8.description: Earners of the Nokia Network Routing Specialist II (NRS II) Certification have a thorough working knowledge of IP routing protocols, IP/MPLS protocols and networking, VPN and VPLS services, basic OAM techniques, and various resiliency techniques. They understand the Nokia network and services architecture and how to utilize it for delivering residential and business communication services.
b46975cb-f047-49bc-b0dc-a9480f5917a8.name: Nokia Network Routing Specialist II (NRS II) Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-C01 Nokia NRS II Composite Exam or equivalent individual written exams.
Pass the NRSII4A0 Nokia NRS II Lab Exam.

0f240d6e-f977-4db2-8597-6891ba7145b8.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-101 exam can understand link-state protocols, route redistribution and filter policies, IP routing design, OSPFv3 networks, IS-IS for IPv6, and IPv6 basics/addressing. They can describe routing protocol databases, basic OSPF/IS-IS operations, OSPF/IS-IS implementation and operability, and differences between IS-IS and OSPF. They can configure OSPF in basic/complex network topologies, and create route operation, verify OSPF operations, and troubleshoot routing issues.
0f240d6e-f977-4db2-8597-6891ba7145b8.name: Nokia Interior Routing Protocols Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-101 Nokia Interior Routing Protocols Exam.

6da3194e-0292-4f90-b019-45fdda7ecbc0.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-102 exam understand BGP route propagation and fast reroute operation, BGP and IGP interaction, and BGP theory/mechanics/attributes. They can configure BGP confederations, route reflections, advertise-external, and add-paths. They can implement BGP networks using Nokia SR OS; Nokia environment policy. Candidates can configure and troubleshoot a multiple BGP peer network, verify policy configuration results, and deploy confederations/route reflections to scale iBGP.
6da3194e-0292-4f90-b019-45fdda7ecbc0.name: Nokia Border Gateway Protocol for Internet Routing Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-102 Nokia Border Gateway Protocol Exam.

3d340984-c942-4cb1-b011-de39a19ef4f3.description: Candidates who have passed the 4A0-106 exam can implement loop prevention, and troubleshoot and monitor VPRN services. They can describe basic VPRN architecture, Inter-AS VPRN models A, B, and C operation, VPRN routing information distribution, BGP loops cause, Internet access provision operation, Multiprotocol BGP extensions, and advanced VPRN topologies services. Successful candidates can also configure VPRN technologies, CSC VPN model, and Inter-As VPRNs.
3d340984-c942-4cb1-b011-de39a19ef4f3.name: Nokia Virtual Private Routed Networks Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-106 Nokia Virtual Private Routed Networks Exam.

1623a738-0bf0-4478-9d0f-3c166efa3b96.description: Candidates that have passed the Nokia NRS II Lab Exam can design and implement networks that meet service requirements and interoperate with other networks that analyze network health and performance, and that resolve network problems quickly.
1623a738-0bf0-4478-9d0f-3c166efa3b96.name: Nokia NRS II Lab Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the NRSII4A0 Nokia NRS II Lab Exam.

d5a673fb-00b9-49ac-8cc3-4ced7ec44f7c.description: Earners of the NNP SD-DC can describe how network virtualization addresses the imitations of the traditional datacenter architecture; describe Nuage Networks VCS and its components including the VSD, VCS, and VRS. They can configure Layer 2 and Layer 3 overlay networks in VCS, configure and verify security and forwarding policies, describe the gateway options and configure them in VCS, describe cloud orchestration and how different cloud management systems are integrated with Nuage Networks.
d5a673fb-00b9-49ac-8cc3-4ced7ec44f7c.name: Nuage Networks Professional – Software Defined Datacenter (NNP SD-DC) Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-N01 Nuage Networks VCS Fundamentals exam.

32eb0287-7316-48db-9728-cbf34557aa3f.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-114 exam understand how MPLS tunnels can be stitched together by having BGP advertise labels in addition to IP prefixes. They also understand EVPN as an alternative way to achieve VPN control signaling. They understand concepts that include BGP messages, peering sessions, path attributes carried by route updates, and the criteria used by BGP to select the “best” route. They also understand route reflectors as a means to improve BGP scalability in autonomous systems.
32eb0287-7316-48db-9728-cbf34557aa3f.name: Nokia Border Gateway Protocol Fundamentals for Services Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-114 Nokia Border Gateway Protocol Fundamentals for Services Exam.

7af6f0e9-71e8-4ba7-877b-1de0bfe3926c.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-105 exam can describe the VPLS FDB, MTU impact on a distributed VPLS service, policy-based forwarding, M-VPLS, use of LAG and MC-LAG in providing resiliency in a VPLS configuration, use of active and standby pseudowires to achieve redundancy instead of STP, key scalability concerns in large VPLS deployments, hierarchical VPLS and its benefits for large VPLS networks, and PBB. They can implement loop control mechanisms such as rapid spanning tree in a VPLS environment.
7af6f0e9-71e8-4ba7-877b-1de0bfe3926c.name: Nokia Virtual Private LAN Services Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-105 Nokia Virtual Private LAN Services Exam.

f44fbe71-92bb-4ebc-b6fe-02ef463b137d.description: Candidates who have passed the 4A0-N02 can: Explain: the driver and evolution of software-defined WAN and Nuage Networks VNS solution; Nuage VNS/the function of its components including the VSD, VSC, NSG; NSG deployment at a branch; extensions to the VNS solution (NSG Enterprise Maps, SD-WAN service portal and VNO) Configure: Layer 3 overlay networks in VNS Apply VNS to common use-cases (branch-to-branch communication, DHCP options, security policies, QoS, NAT/PAT, dual uplink, IPsec VPN).
f44fbe71-92bb-4ebc-b6fe-02ef463b137d.name: Nuage Networks Virtualized Network Services (VNS) Fundamentals Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-N02 Nuage Networks VNS Fundamentals exam.

fb6b0799-ecdf-4fbb-8ddd-0a54f6907ea1.description: Earners of the Nokia Service Routing Architect (SRA) Certification have in-depth working knowledge in areas that include Border Gateway Protocol (BGP), Virtual Private LAN Service (VPLS), Virtual Private Routed Networks (VPRN), and Quality of Service (QoS).
fb6b0799-ecdf-4fbb-8ddd-0a54f6907ea1.name: Nokia Service Routing Architect (SRA) Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-C02 Nokia SRA Composite Exam or equivalent individual written exams.
Have an active Network Routing Specialist II (NRS II) Certification.
Pass the ASRA4A0 Nokia SRA Lab Exam.

97e94472-7497-462d-97f4-33b73dccab29.description: Earners of the NNP SD-WAN Certification understand the technology and best practices to implement scalable enterprise solutions using Nuage Networks solutions for software defined WAN. They can understand Nuage Networks VNS components, describe VSD, VSC and NSG, configure a VNS environment, define global parameters, configure domains, security policies, service chaining, VNS bootstrapping, QoS and statistics.
97e94472-7497-462d-97f4-33b73dccab29.name: Nuage Networks Professional – Software Defined WAN (NNP SD-WAN) Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-N02 Nuage Networks VNS Fundamentals exam.

f7ffd67e-9196-4867-a044-1896321ad779.description: Candidates who have passed the 4A0-N01 exam can describe how network virtualization addresses the limitations of the traditional data center architecture; Nuage Networks VCS/its components, VSD, VSC, VRS; the concept of cloud orchestration, and how different cloud management systems are integrated with Nuage Networks. They can also configure and verify security/forwarding policies, L2 and L3 overlay networks in VCS, and gateway options in VCS.
f7ffd67e-9196-4867-a044-1896321ad779.name: Nuage Networks Virtualized Cloud Services (VCS) Fundamentals exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-N01 Nuage Networks VCS Fundamentals exam.

c46ee98e-c9a4-455e-ba40-50a5c8c80d7b.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-107 exam understand traffic classification, queuing and scheduling, support for optimal network resources use, WRED purpose, egress port scheduling/HQoS scheduler operation, configured rate, CIR, MBS, CBS and HPO to color packets enforcement, and Ethernet queue groups. They understand CFHP design/configuration/application and the need for QoS in services. Successful candidates can implement QoS on the Nokia 7750 SR to achieve differentiated services.
c46ee98e-c9a4-455e-ba40-50a5c8c80d7b.name: Nokia Quality of Service Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-107 Nokia Quality of Service Exam.

a7b1bb6e-be08-4812-8f95-176cc2e414c5.description: Earners of the Nokia Optical Network Professional have foundational knowledge of WDM transmission and principles, optical network design, network element architectures, and management of Nokia 1830 PSS based networks. They are able to design and build a simple optical network using the 1830 EPT and NFM-T on a simple 1830 PSS-based network.
a7b1bb6e-be08-4812-8f95-176cc2e414c5.name: Nokia Optical Network Professional Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-205 Nokia Optical Networks Fundamentals Exam.

a5046519-1043-4ee1-876a-53c9d5958f63.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-113 exam understand the operation and use of the OSPF routing protocol. They understand static routing and the different methods available to populate the routing table. They also understand route redistribution, route filtering, equal-cost multipath (ECMP) routing, bidirectional forwarding detection (BFD), and IP fast re-route based on loop-free alternative (LFA) paths. They can configure both IPv4 and IPv6 routing.
a5046519-1043-4ee1-876a-53c9d5958f63.name: Nokia OSPF Routing Protocol Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-113 Nokia OPSF Routing Protocol Exam.

09ed3297-21cb-454f-ae4b-1e9d8279f686.description: Earners of the Nokia Data Center Fabric Professional Certification have foundational knowledge of modern data center networking architectures using layer 3 and BGP for routing. They understand the Nokia SR Linux architecture, 7220/7250 IXR routers, the Fabric Services System, and Zero Touch Provisioning (ZTP). They can also make use of the SR Linux CLI and can configure and verify interfaces and routing protocols along with using other SR Linux logging, monitoring, and filtering tools.
09ed3297-21cb-454f-ae4b-1e9d8279f686.name: Nokia Data Center Fabric Professional Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-D01 Nokia Data Center Fabric Fundamentals Exam.

skills.name: SR Linux User And System Management

1c64b8b3-d809-4366-8760-b30706a47aaa.description: Candidates who pass exam 4A0-D01 understand modern data center networking architectures using layer 3 and BGP for routing. They understand the Nokia SR Linux architecture, 7220/7250 IXR routers, the Fabric Services System, and Zero Touch Provisioning (ZTP). They can also make use of the SR Linux CLI and can configure and verify interfaces and routing protocols along with using other SR Linux logging, monitoring, and filtering tools.
1c64b8b3-d809-4366-8760-b30706a47aaa.name: Nokia Data Center Fabric Fundamentals Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-D01 Nokia Data Center Fabric Fundamentals Exam.

skills.name: SR Linux User And System Management

dd8b31bc-8d72-4e4e-95ff-d786718a4253.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-108 exam can describe a multicast-enabled network operation, IGMPv2, IGMPv3, PIM operation, IGM techniques, multicast network resiliency techniques, NG MVPN operation and, can configure/operate/implement multicast VPN using Draft Rosen. They can implement IPv6 multicast using MLD, SSM, and ASM, and understand IP packet delivery, IGP, and SM/SSM benefits. Candidates can configure and verify IGMP operation/parameters, and PIMSM/PIM-SSM intra-domain multicast deployment.
dd8b31bc-8d72-4e4e-95ff-d786718a4253.name: Nokia Multicast Protocols Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-108 Nokia Multicast Protocols Exam.

19faf495-49b3-4aa1-929d-dc05c4bb5d9a.description: Candidates that have passed the Nokia SRA Lab Exam can design and implement networks that meet service requirements and interoperate with other networks to analyze network health and performance, and resolve network problems quickly.
19faf495-49b3-4aa1-929d-dc05c4bb5d9a.name: Nokia SRA Lab Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the ASRA4A0 Nokia SRA Lab Exam.

bab812d4-c9fa-4202-a5ae-6d207684cfcf.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-112 exam understand the operation and use of the IS-IS routing protocol. They understand static routing and the different methods available to populate the routing table. They also understand route redistribution, route filtering, equal-cost multipath (ECMP) routing, bidirectional forwarding detection (BFD), and IP fast re-route based on loop-free alternative (LFA) paths. They can configure both IPv4 and IPv6 routing.
bab812d4-c9fa-4202-a5ae-6d207684cfcf.name: Nokia IS-IS Routing Protocol Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-112 Nokia IS-IS Routing Protocol Exam.

8be13be3-a0ac-4883-a86b-96b8a0e19516.description: Those who pass the 4A0-250 exam can identify traffic matrix components, service types, and EPT-supported network layer. They can explain amplification in optical networks, WDM network relationships, DCN, WDM network design process, and EPT features. Candidates can analyze network topologies for possible directions, demand routing, network element configuration, routing constraints, and NE configuration details. They design simple WDM networks and EPT network corresponding to basic requirements.
8be13be3-a0ac-4883-a86b-96b8a0e19516.name: Nokia Fundamentals of Optical Network Design Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-250 Nokia Fundamentals of Optical Network Design exam.

76cc0ad6-86a5-4abb-b03f-eebc3779fc82.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-N03 exam can understand Nuage Networks VCS and components, VSP-managed system networks, IP connectivity, protocols network elements use. They can configure statistic collection and threshold crossing alerts. Successful candidates can also troubleshoot issues affecting VSP-managed datacenter operation with system tools and log files, and access the VSD to retrieve information using the REST API. Candidates can also backup and restore the VSD database.
76cc0ad6-86a5-4abb-b03f-eebc3779fc82.name: Nuage Networks Virtualized Cloud Services (VCS) Operations Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-N03 Nuage Networks VCS Operations exam.

074501f0-ffb3-44f2-89e2-3ca3ba9a7028.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-M02 exam can describe mobile communication evolution, LTE architecture/components, IP connectivity, EPS bearers GTP, SGW & PGW functions, and QoS Analyze LTE procedures. They can implement functionality on 7750 SR MG, and configure Nokia 7750 SR MG hardware and basic tasks for SGW/PGW. Successful candidates can initiate and verify LTE procedures on 7750, and troubleshoot MG issues on 7750 with OAM/debug tools.
074501f0-ffb3-44f2-89e2-3ca3ba9a7028.name: Nokia Mobile Gateways Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-M02 Nokia Mobile Gateways exam.

3795c1f5-a641-4339-918e-f10c2449ec8a.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-M03 understand logical interfaces, MME ESM/EMM functions, SM/MM SGSN roles, SGSN/MME interworking support, MOCN/GWCN, end-user services architecture, load balancing mechanisms, MME/SGW restoration, AKA/NAS SMC procedures, and Nokia CMM user role management. They can configure CLI on CMM, integrity algorithms, paging policies, emergency profiles on Nokia CMM. Candidates can also initiate Nokia CMM LTE procedures, and troubleshoot Nokia CMM issues with debugging tools.
3795c1f5-a641-4339-918e-f10c2449ec8a.name: Nokia Mobility Manager Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-M03 Nokia Mobility Manager exam.

69c810ad-1f58-4e6a-b626-b70691205f7c.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-M05 exam can understand architecture/cloud-native design capabilities, CPC management, VNF architecture/VM components, 5G deployment options, SPS VNF architecture/components, CPC network function virtualization, CMM/CMG VNF-required IP networks, and CMM/CMG VNF dimensioning/scaling/resiliency/lifecycle management. They can deploy CMM/CMG with CBAM/perform LCM operations, verify CPC VNF, and can troubleshoot virtualization infrastructure/LTE Attach failure scenarios.
69c810ad-1f58-4e6a-b626-b70691205f7c.name: Nokia Cloud Packet Core Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-M05 Nokia Cloud Packet Core exam.

6ed58538-ec89-46d6-8abf-d020470cb290.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-205 exam understand optical signal propagation, WDM building blocks, trail/service, NFM-T infrastructure, and survivability/availability. They can identify engineering parameters, WDM node architectures, network topology, alarms, and performance metrics. Candidates perform monitor channel power and commission network via NFM-T. They can verify network elements through EPT and NFM-T restoration/protection implementation, and can also design networks using 1830 EPT.
6ed58538-ec89-46d6-8abf-d020470cb290.name: Nokia Optical Networking Fundamentals Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-205 Nokia Optical Networking Fundamentals exam.

754ac219-4014-4aaa-a39d-6ae016bfb302.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-111 exam understand security components/challenges, encryption algorithms, and SR OS control/data plane. They can describe management plane access types, control plane threats, CPM protection, monitoring, and IPSec protocols. Candidates can configure router access control feature, Layer 2 and 3 VPLS security techniques, mirroring, traffic/BGP filters, BGP RTBH/Flowspec/ROV, IPv4/IPv6 protocol uRPF, and IPSec tunnels; and implement configuration management features.
754ac219-4014-4aaa-a39d-6ae016bfb302.name: Nokia Network and Service Router Security Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-111 Network and Service Router Security Exam.

bba6ab8b-c4f6-4052-8c75-26b43f772baa.description: Candidates who have passed the 4A0-N07 can understand Nuage Networks component functions, VNS-managed system networks, IP reachability requirements, and network element protocols (XMPP, OpenFlow, BGP). They can configure statistics collection/threshold crossing alerts and can troubleshoot issues affecting VSP managed datacenter operation with system tools/log files. Successful candidates can also use REST API to access VSD/retrieve information and backup and restore the VSD database.
bba6ab8b-c4f6-4052-8c75-26b43f772baa.name: Nuage Networks Virtualized Network Services (VNS) Operations Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-N07 Nuage Networks VNS Operations exam.

ce33723e-3777-4430-8e74-f6574b90bdf9.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-265 can explain 1830 PSS node optical signal flow, EDFA Raman amplification, and active alarm/PM retrieval. They can locate EPT commissioning data, WT detection points, wave key sources, fiber cuts. They configure fault isolation and power management settings and troubleshoot alarms/power adjustment failures/OSC issues. Adjust channel power and calculate span loss, and can resolve FEC configuration, payload type/encapsulation mode, and fiber connection issues.
ce33723e-3777-4430-8e74-f6574b90bdf9.name: Nokia Optical Diagnostics and Troubleshooting Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-265 Nokia Diagnostics and Troubleshooting exam.

c2ff2e08-4a1f-4721-8e8e-ac7fdd39fcb1.description: Candidates that have passed the Nokia NRS II Composite Exam understand important concepts of Interior Routing Protocols, Multiprotocol Label Switching, and Services Architecture. Candidates can configure and verify complex networks, demonstrate a good understanding of MPLS and the establishment of label switched paths, and configure, verify, and troubleshoot an IPv4 and IPv6 VPRN Service.
c2ff2e08-4a1f-4721-8e8e-ac7fdd39fcb1.name: Nokia NRS II Composite Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-C01 Nokia NRS II Composite Exam.

2b0bc689-441b-4bbc-a4e0-a036c3bee426.description: Earners of the NNIS certification have the specialized knowledge and skills required for software installation, verification, and troubleshooting of the Nuage Networks Virtualized Services Platform (VSP). They are familiar with Nuage Networks VSP hardware and software requirements, Linux environment requirements, installation scripts, and verification, and troubleshooting techniques.
2b0bc689-441b-4bbc-a4e0-a036c3bee426.name: Nuage Networks Virtual Services Platform Installation Specialist (NNIS) Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the NNIS-LE Nuage Networks VSP Software Installation lab exam.

684ddcef-4c99-4915-be49-2077c28b6081.description: Candidates who pass the Nokia Advanced Optical Network Design exam understand advanced customer requirements, QoT metrics, parameters/inputs to design advanced WDM networks, Raman amplification, and OSNR margin. They can analyze encryption requirements/implementation, Network Management infrastructure components, long links/routes network topology, and EPT NE configurations. Candidates can create network designs with advanced customer requirements and configure advanced design elements.
684ddcef-4c99-4915-be49-2077c28b6081.name: Nokia Advanced Optical Network Design Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-255 Nokia Advanced Optical Network Design exam.

c075d021-960d-4ff2-a71d-a0b4d6d31121.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-116 exam have the essential knowledge required to deploy a network’s transport-tunnel infrastructure using segment routing. It examines segment routing concepts, terminology, and signaling through an enhanced link-state routing protocol, such as IS-IS and OSPF. The course discusses the control-plane and the data-plane behavior of the protocols.
c075d021-960d-4ff2-a71d-a0b4d6d31121.name: Nokia Segment Routing Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-116 Nokia Segment Routing Exam.

61fe389c-31ad-4bab-b03a-a3e9bc071a0b.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-115 exam have the knowledge required to deploy and operate EVPN Layer-2 and Layer-3 services. Topics such as EVPN concepts and terminology are covered. The course also explores the different EVPN route types required to support the operation of EVPN ELAN, EVPN integrated routing and bridging, and EVPN Eline services. In addition, it entails the operation of all-active and single-active multi-homing.
61fe389c-31ad-4bab-b03a-a3e9bc071a0b.name: Ethernet Virtual Private Network Services Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-115 Nokia Ethernet Virtual Private Network Services Exam

df78739e-d29d-4d0a-a3e3-0e30f9ce24c6.description: Candidates who pass the Nuage Networks VSP Software Installation lab exam have the ability install, verify, and troubleshoot the Nuage Networks Virtualized Services Platform (VSP). They can verify and configure hardware and software environments, as well as troubleshoot common installation problems.
df78739e-d29d-4d0a-a3e3-0e30f9ce24c6.name: Nuage Networks Virtualized Services Platform (VSP) Software Installation Lab Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the NNIS-LE VSP Softerware Installation lab exam.

63d68328-4c73-489e-8d66-82fbbf7a3968.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-210 exam can understand network commissioning tools, NFM-T processes, PM collection, and routing views analysis. They can provide uplinks and infrastructure and services in basic network scenarios. Candidates can create network elements including WDM, Switched NE, OCS and compound nodes, Optical/Electrical Protection Schema, ASON protected infrastructures, and basic networks with WDM/Switched NE. Candidates can also manage planes, ASON L0, and ASON L1.
63d68328-4c73-489e-8d66-82fbbf7a3968.name: Nokia Optical Network Management with NFM-T Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-210 Nokia Optical Network Management with NFM-T exam.

0c566c7b-a9c2-4073-bef5-1596d73c57ed.description: Candidates who have passed the 4A0-N06 can understand the use and configuration of the routing protocol (OSPF and BGP) on the NSG, the purpose and operation of the NSG-UBR, domain linking options benefits/configuration of AAR, approaches to using NSG as an IKE IPSec gateway, and how virtual machines can be instantiated on the NSG to virtualize a network function.
0c566c7b-a9c2-4073-bef5-1596d73c57ed.name: Nuage Networks Virtualized Network Services (VNS) – Advanced Topics Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-N06 Nuage Networks VNS Advanced Topics exam.

f86fa73c-f9f7-4100-87cc-513b65297f11.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-N04 can explain Nuage VSP architecture, OpenStack architecture, OpenStack Neutron ML2 plugin, OpenStack/Nuage Networks integration models, integrated OpenStack/Nuage Networks solution, VSDK, and VSP REST API. They can identify Nuage Networks drivers and networks with OpenStack benefits. Candidates can configure Nuage Networks extensions in OpenStack deployment, and create L2/L3 networks; security groups/security policies with Architect GUI/OpenStack/CLI/Dashboard.
f86fa73c-f9f7-4100-87cc-513b65297f11.name: Nuage Networks OpenStack Integration Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-N04 Nuage Networks OpenStack integration exam.

3b6d6cdb-85b4-424a-b127-c39137a944ec.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-N05 understand topologies/protocols in data center fabric, BGP configuration on VCS virtual ports, domain linking options, virtual machine packet routing options, VRS with dual uplinks advantages, extending domain to data center gateway to reach external networks, how policy groups improve security/forwarding policy granularity/flexibility, virtual machines send/receive multicast traffic, VCS quality of service capabilities, and Nokia 7750 SR configuration with VSD.
3b6d6cdb-85b4-424a-b127-c39137a944ec.name: Nuage Networks Virtualized Cloud Services (VCS) – Advanced Topics Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-N05 Nuage Networks VCS Advanced Topics exam.

d03673f4-b366-43e5-b8a7-b94ae95c5e60.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-260 exam can explain NSP and NFM-T features, WDM/OTN convergence, advanced configurations, C+L band support, advanced scenarios, ASON MRN, and GMPLS/non-GMPLS link. They can configure nodes via NFM-T, OTS links, ODUflex services, protection mechanisms, and non-GMPLS traffic reroute. Candidates can also construct networks, alien services, and lightpath network architectures; and can identify service implementation and network management functions.
d03673f4-b366-43e5-b8a7-b94ae95c5e60.name: Nokia Advanced Optical Network Management with NFM-T Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-260 Nokia Advanced Optical Network Management wit NFM-T exam.

7f4eee82-8ed0-4f98-b51a-d5190117a3e8.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-220 exam can describe GMPLS protocol behavior/features, LSP and its metrics, main GMPLS protocol working principles, GMPLS maintenance/operations fundamentals, protection, restoration, and PRC. They can implement restoration across multiple layers and advanced survivability features. Successful candidates can manage optical networks with GMRE Illustrate control plane architecture and compare restoration mechanisms at different layers using GMRE and NFM-T
7f4eee82-8ed0-4f98-b51a-d5190117a3e8.name: Nokia GMPLS-Controlled Optical Networks Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-220 Nokia GMPLS-controlled Optical Networks exam.

83de0113-8f9d-4107-9add-7578767906b4.description: Earners of the NNE SD-DC certification have expert-level planning, installing, and operating networks knowledge using Nuage Networks solutions for software defined datacenters. They understand Datacenter Network Architecture, NN VCS use cases, cloud orchestration, CMS integration, VSD, VSC, VRS, VRS-G and Openstack installation, management, underlay and overlay network maintenance, statistics collection and Threshold Crossing Alerts (TCAs), troubleshooting tools, backup and restore procedures.
83de0113-8f9d-4107-9add-7578767906b4.name: Nuage Networks Expert – Software Defined Datacenter (NNE SD-DC) Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-N01 Nuage Networks VCS Fundamentals, 4A0-N03 Nuage Networks VCS Operations written exams.
Pass the NNIS-LE Nuage Networks VSP Software Installation lab exam.
Pass the NNESDDC-LE lab exam.

ce04413d-7c2d-44d9-b9fe-d036391d4515.description: Earners of this certification understand the foundations of IP network automation and how NSP drives automation using programmable APIs, workflows and intent-based networking. They understand the NSP technologies that enable software-defined networking (SDN) and network automation, how to design and manage workflows to automate, the concepts and procedures of intent design and management, and how NSP automates network operations using APIs to consume and monitor network resources.
ce04413d-7c2d-44d9-b9fe-d036391d4515.name: Nokia Certified NSP IP Network Automation Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-AI1 Nokia NSP IP Network Automation Professional Composite Exam.

cf727f0e-3e7f-4e09-bda7-5d0a9950f1aa.description: Candidates who pass the Nuage Networks Expert SD-DC lab exam can provision and troubleshoot the datacenter using Nuage Networks Virtualized Cloud Services (VCS). Earners understand the VSP platform, management network maintenance, underlay and overlay network maintenance, statistics collection and TCAs, and troubleshooting tools.
cf727f0e-3e7f-4e09-bda7-5d0a9950f1aa.name: Nuage Networks Expert - Software Defined Datacenter (SD-DC) Lab Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the NNE SD-DC lab exam.

89c19a42-dea6-4603-a841-87aa3ca64d7f.description: Candidates who pass the Nuage Networks Expert SD-WAN lab exam have the ability to provide and troubleshoot SD-WAN services using Nuage Networks Virtualized Network Services (VNS). Earners are familiar with the VNS product portfolio and use cases, overlay network maintenance, statistics collection, troubleshooting tools, and backup and restore procedures.
89c19a42-dea6-4603-a841-87aa3ca64d7f.name: Nuage Networks Expert – Software Defined Wide Area Network (SD-WAN) Lab Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the NNESDWAN-LE lab exam.

73ec6c72-af98-4bd0-b775-19b57d4d4d78.description: Earners of the NN NNE SD-WAN certification have expert-level knowledge for planning, installing, and operating networks using Nuage Networks solutions for software defined WAN. They understand NN VNS Product Portfolio, NN VNS Use Cases, NN Product Portfolio, management network maintenance, underlay network maintenance, and statistics collection. They are also familiar with Threshold Crossing Alerts (TCAs), troubleshooting tools and backup and restore procedures.
73ec6c72-af98-4bd0-b775-19b57d4d4d78.name: Nuage Networks Expert – Software Defined WAN (NNE SD-WAN) Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-N02 Nuage Networks VNS Fundamentals and 4A0-N07 Nuage Networks VNS Operations written exams.
Pass the NNIS-LE Nuage Networks VSP Software Installation lab exam.
Pass the NNESDWAN-LE lab exam.

08ce220c-8dc1-41d8-8bc1-108812d840df.description: Candidates who pass the Nokia Optical Network Design Expert lab exam have the ability to design optical networks based on the Nokia 1830 Photonic Service Switch (PSS) and 1830 Engineering and Planning Tool (EPT).
08ce220c-8dc1-41d8-8bc1-108812d840df.name: Nokia Optical Network Design Expert Lab Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the ONDE-LE Nokia Optical Network Design Expert lab exam.

e06ee43c-f09a-4af8-8a2f-33f6faf89df9.description: Earners of the Nokia Optical Network Design Expert certification have in-depth working knowledge in optical network design with different node architectures, GMPLS control plane, quality of transmission guarantees, availability constraints, advanced requirements, and hardware and site constraints requiring advanced optimization.
e06ee43c-f09a-4af8-8a2f-33f6faf89df9.name: Nokia Optical Network Design Expert Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-250 Nokia Fundamentals of Optical Network Design exam.
Pass the 4A0-255 Nokia Advanced Optical Network Design exam
Pass the ONDE-LE Nokia Optical Network Design Expert Lab Exam

c2b54558-dca2-4c7a-8bb9-e7a38239abdb.description: Earners of the Nokia Optical Network Architect Certification have the complete set of end-to-end knowledge and practical skills required to design, manage and troubleshoot leading edge optical networks based on the Nokia 1830 PSS. They understand advanced topics in network design, network management, diagnostics and troubleshooting.
c2b54558-dca2-4c7a-8bb9-e7a38239abdb.name: Nokia Optical Network Architect Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass written exams 4A0-250, 4A0-255, 4A0-260, 4A0-265.
Pass the ONCA-LE Nokia Optical Network Architect lab exam

2180d6b9-c491-478d-948f-101958605018.description: Candidates who pass the Nokia Optical Network Architect lab exam have the ability to design, manage, and troubleshoot optical networks based on the Nokia 1830 Photonic Service Switch (PSS), 1830 Engineering and Planning Tool (EPT), and Network Functions Manager for Transport (NFM-T).
2180d6b9-c491-478d-948f-101958605018.name: Nokia Optical Network Architect Lab Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the ONA-LE Nokia Optical Network Architect lab exam.

8cf4d03e-6eba-497d-ac65-95db0d4398bc.description: Candidates that have passed the Nokia SRA Composite Exam understand important concepts of Border Gateway Protocol, Virtual Private LAN Services, Virtual Private Routed Networks, and Quality of Service. They can configure, troubleshoot, and verify various BGP, VPLS, VPRN, and QoS topics..
8cf4d03e-6eba-497d-ac65-95db0d4398bc.name: Nokia SRA Composite Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-C02 Nokia SRA Composite Exam.

fdc19138-3cf6-40cf-aefc-fb76e383fde1.description: Candidates who pass the Nokia Cloud Packet Core Expert lab exam can provision and troubleshoot the Cloud Packet Core network using Nokia Cloud Mobility Manager (CMM) and Cloud Mobile Gateway(CMG) which are deployed by OpenStack.
fdc19138-3cf6-40cf-aefc-fb76e383fde1.name: Nokia Cloud Packet Core Expert Lab Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the CPCE-LE Nokia Cloud Packet Core Expert lab exam.

82f03a53-ed7b-44f3-ae69-1c667b08cf74.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-M10 exam can identify 5G performance requirements, 5G NR components, and NGC logical interfaces. They understand E2E 5G option 3X solution, CMG CUPS configuration steps, NFs/5G SBA, 5G mobility/session management functions, UE registration/PDU session establishment, Nokia 5G packet core solution, and 5G QoS/5G security architecture/end-to-end system deployment options. They can also configure Nokia CMM to enable AMF; allow 5G UE registration/PDU session establishment.
82f03a53-ed7b-44f3-ae69-1c667b08cf74.name: Nokia 5G Packet Core Architecture Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-M10 5G Packet Core Architecture exam.

21e8ea76-2052-4561-8ef9-d4e587c15d9e.description: Candidates that have passed the Nokia NRS II Composite Exam: OSPF version understand important concepts of OSPF Routing Protocol, Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS), Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) for Internet Services, and Services Architecture. Candidates can configure and verify complex networks and demonstrate a good understanding of each concept.
21e8ea76-2052-4561-8ef9-d4e587c15d9e.name: Nokia NRS II Composite Exam: OSPF version

badge_template_activities.title: Nokia NRS II Composite Exam: OSPF version.

30d6ee69-df53-4c95-818a-87bdb58d807c.description: Earners of the Nokia Cloud Packet Core Expert certification have in-depth working knowledge of the architecture, interfaces, protocols, mobility management, and session management in the packet core. They have a working knowledge of the VNF architecture of the Nokia CMM and CMG and their cloud-native characteristics in Nokia’s Cloud Packet Core architecture. They also have a basic understanding of 5G and 5G deployment options for Nokia CPC support of the evolution to 5G.
30d6ee69-df53-4c95-818a-87bdb58d807c.name: Nokia Cloud Packet Core Expert Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass 4A0-M02 Nokia Mobile Gateways, 4A0-M03 Nokia Mobility Manager, and the 4A0-M05 Nokia Cloud Packet Core written exams.
Pass Nokia Cloud Packet Core Expert lab exam.

ab416e2f-1705-431c-a295-e9ebdb90f20d.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-230 exam understand Integrated Packet Transport over WDM solution, SR OS service model, Carrier Ethernet services, Ethernet bridging/MAC learning, 802.1Q VLANs, Q-in-Q tagging, QoS in 1830 PSS-based network, Ethernet OAM on 1830 PSS, G.8032 ERP, LAG, and MC-LAG. They configure VPLS in Provider Bridge 1830 PSS network, ERP in 1830 PSS-based network, and LAG/MC-LAG in 1830 PSS-based network; and can perform ethernet OAM tasks in 1830 PSS-based network and ESM on NFM-T.
ab416e2f-1705-431c-a295-e9ebdb90f20d.name: Nokia Integrated Packet Transport over WDM Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-230 Nokia Integrated Packet Transport over WDM exam.

724f08cb-c1ee-4a0b-bd7c-22bb0c826d96.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-240 exam can explain cellular network basics, 5G characteristics/functionalities, D-RAN/C-RAN/Cloud-RAN and passive/active architectures, fronthaul/midhaul/backhaul/anyhaul, CPRI, OBSAI, OPS-based fronthaul solution, TPS solution, and 1588v2 Precision Time Protocol. They can identify RAN mobile components, fronthaul architecture requirements, OPS ring traffic, synchronization delivery requirements, and VWM components; and can configure basic protection mechanisms.
724f08cb-c1ee-4a0b-bd7c-22bb0c826d96.name: Nokia Optical Transport for Mobile Services Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-240 Nokia Optical Transport for Mobile Services exam.

9eb71395-b29e-4b49-a669-62bb3a6c0d16.description: Candidates that have passed the Nokia NRS II Composite Exam: IS-IS version understand important concepts of IS-IS Routing Protocol, Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS), Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) for Internet Services, and Services Architecture. Candidates can configure and verify complex networks and demonstrate a good understanding of each concept.
9eb71395-b29e-4b49-a669-62bb3a6c0d16.name: Nokia NRS II Composite Exam: IS-IS version

badge_template_activities.title: Nokia NRS II Composite Exam: IS-IS version.

5daa94c8-5c1e-4701-acf8-fae7435102d5.description: Candidates who pass the Nuage Networks Virtuoso lab exam have the ability to provision and troubleshoot the datacenter and SD-WAN services using Nuage Networks Virtualized Cloud Services (VCS) and Virtualized Network Services (VNS) solution.
5daa94c8-5c1e-4701-acf8-fae7435102d5.name: Nuage Networks Virtuoso Lab Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the NNV-LE lab exam.

2e4b3d44-e699-4754-b232-b3d3526e38f7.description: Earners of the NN NNV certification have knowledge and skills to plan and implement cloud-based solutions across datacenters and branch sites using SDN technology. They can understand Nuage Networks VSP components and operations, configure an enterprise network in Nuage Networks VSP, install and verify Nuage Networks VSP software, describe VSD, VSC and NSG. They are familiar with QoS and statistics, Nuage Networks API, Nuage Networks/CMS integration and Interoperation scenarios.
2e4b3d44-e699-4754-b232-b3d3526e38f7.name: Nuage Networks Virtuoso (NNV) Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-N01 Nuage Networks VCS Fundamentals, 4A0-N03 Nuage Networks VCS Operations written exams or pass the 4A0-N02 Nuage Networks VNS Fundamentals and 4A0-N07 Nuage Networks VNS Operations written exams.
Pass the 4A0-N04, 4A0-N05, 4A0-N06, and NNIS-LE exams.
Pass the NNESDDC-LE or NNESDWAN-LE lab exam and the NNV-LE lab exam.

e8fa5f3f-1a63-42df-8a71-c3cc35bdbb7e.description: Earners of the Nokia Optical Network Services Expert have an in-depth working knowledge in areas such as Wavelength Division Multiplexing networks and node architectures, Layer 0 and Layer 1 switching, GMPLS networks, NSP/NFM-T network management and basic use of 1830 Engineering and Planning Tool (EPT). They reflect the different services enabled by Nokia optical networks: GMPLS-controlled Optical Networks, Optical Transport for Mobile Services, and Integrated Packet Transport over WDM.
e8fa5f3f-1a63-42df-8a71-c3cc35bdbb7e.name: Nokia Optical Network Services Expert Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-205 Nokia Optical Networks Fundamentals Exam and an elective written exam.
Pass the 4A0-210 Nokia Optical Network Management with NFM-T exam
Pass the ONSE-LE Nokia Optical Network Services Expert Lab Exam

2c63a7ab-8d72-487b-8e1d-8f9ca778991d.description: Candidates who pass the Nokia Optical Network Services Expert lab exam can configure optical networks and provision different types of services based on the Nokia 1830 Photonic Service Switch (PSS), 1830 Engineering and Planning Tool (EPT), and Network Functions Manager for Transport (NFM-T).
2c63a7ab-8d72-487b-8e1d-8f9ca778991d.name: Nokia Optical Network Services Expert Lab Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the ONSE-LE Nokia Optical Network Services Expert lab exam

7e90e3f8-42c0-4fe5-8e34-f99992592c14.description: Candidates who pass the 4A0-M15 can understand Nuage Networks SDN, VSP components/deployment, VSC/VRS, VNF management, CBND, datacenter management architecture, SDN networking, datacenter fabric setup, CBIS deployment/integration, SR-IOV/WBX port mapping, VSD policies, VNF instantiation/network creation, and end-to-end MANO architecture/CloudBand and SDN integration. They can also comprehend CPC service instantiation, CPC CMM/CMG networking use case, and DCS benefits Instantiate a CMG with CBAM.
7e90e3f8-42c0-4fe5-8e34-f99992592c14.name: Nokia Orchestration and SDN for Cloud Packet Core Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 4A0-M15 Nokia Orchestration and SDN for Cloud Packet Core exam.
